application_use_case: Cloud-based AI companion leveraging Gemini 1.5 Flash to interpret elderly health vitals, providing conversational insights, alerts, and a caregiver web dashboard.
high_level_design: FastAPI backend on Cloud Run exposes REST APIs. The system incorporates a custom Health Agent using Gemini 1.5 Flash and Cloud SQL/PostgreSQL. An Nginx frontend displays dashboards, charts, alerts, and an AI chat interface.
